title: Spacious apt- 43 Daniels st - Cats and Dogs - Easy St parking
posting_body: ['Medford Center - Dining and Living Room - Exclusive Free Laundry', 'Medford / Medford Center /', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', 'Features', 'Cats are negotiable with Landlord.', '1 minute walk to Major Bus Routes.', 'Exclusive Free Laundry in the basement', 'Free Street Parking.', 'Modern Kitchen', '2 Family hours, apt on the 1st floor.', 'Apartment Summary', 'Located in the Medford Square area, 1st floor apartment in a 2 family house on a quiet street close to Medford Square.', ' Updated kitchen with dishwasher, disposal and microwave.', " Free laundry is in the basement and there's a nice rear porch!", ' Easy access to buses.', 'Cats and Dogs are negotiable.', ' (Reference #175847)', 'Apartment Details', 'Kitchen:', 'Open Concept.', ' Appliances include:  Refrigerator, Natural Gas Stove, Dishwasher, Garbage Disposal, Microwave.', 'Bath:', '1', 'Bedrooms:', '1', 'Reference:', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Location:', 'Medford Square', 'Contact Information', 'Agent:', 'Brandon Spellman', 'Call:', '617-855-5594', 'Please mention reference #', '175847', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', '** Pictures are of model unit, and furnished appliances may vary.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
